tweet: Today on #VietnamWarVeteransDay, I join Hoosiers and the rest of the nation paying tribute to my fellow soldiers. As a Vietnam veteran, it is the greatest honor to recognize their bravery and courage on behalf of the United States. Thank you for your service, and welcome home. pic.twitter.com/InE0ZJcBl2

Nearly 17% of Indiana’s workforce is employed in manufacturing – it's a key part of our economy. Innovations in manufacturing increase productivity, drive economic progress, and create new American industries. Tune in to our @housesciencegop hearing at 10am ET to learn more.

Spoke with WMRS 107.7 in Monticello today about traveling across the district, my first three months in office, and how our team is focused on serving #IN04. Thanks for letting me join the show! pic.twitter.com/0jMsBiZpTY

Great meeting with our #IN04 farmers this morning at the Farm Bureau's round-table in White County. Their work is the backbone of our economy and I'm proud that we all call The Hoosier State home. pic.twitter.com/ttXGKMRqX2

Had a nice visit this morning with students from the Purdue University College of Agriculture and officers with Indiana FFA. As a fellow Purdue Ag alum, I'm proud to see these students engaged in civics and leading the way in agriculture. #NationalAgDay pic.twitter.com/7nuQ9LVb5P
Agriculture is a major part of Indiana's economy. Thank you to all the hardworking Hoosiers supporting the Ag industry. #NationalAgWeek pic.twitter.com/1au6sUNTDa
